items.question: Why do the police/detectives show each other the number 4 on their fingers at various times?
items.answer: Code 4 means all secure so if you flash four fingers at another officer your telling them you are secure

items.question: When will Southland be on Netflix?
items.answer: South land is available on HBO Max, so probably won't be on Netflix.

spoilerItems.question: I am wondering why Sammy was so worried about losing his son to Tammy and why he felt guilty about anything?
spoilerItems.answer: Because he loved his son,. And Tammy's a junkie.
